SELECT * FROM boards WHERE id = #{id} AND is_active = 1

SELECT * FROM boards WHERE is_global = 1 AND is_active = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards (name, is_global, description, is_active, sort_order, created_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{isGlobal}, #{description}, #{isActive}, #{sortOrder}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE boards SET name = #{name}, is_global = #{isGlobal}, description = #{description}, is_active = #{isActive}, sort_order = #{sortOrder} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM boards WHERE name = #{name} AND is_active = 1)
